entry.title: Kingsmill - Finest Hot Chocolate Mix Single Serve - 50 x 28 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kingsmill
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 21.99

Kingsmill - Finest Hot Chocolate Single Serve Packets - 50 x 28 g

This Finest Hot Chocolate Single Serve comes with all the flavor and frothiness of decadent cafe drinks without all of the time and effort. Each pack of mix delivers a consistent product each and every time. This mix is designed for use in a hot chocolate or cappuccino machine for bulk preparation, but is also ideal for making individual cups by hand mixing with hot water. The perfect addition to any establishment, this mix is sure to please patrons at your coffee shop, restaurant, concession stand, convenience store, or waiting room.

A simple hot chocolate mix to satisfy those cravings. Add 175mL of hot milk or hot water to contents of the pouch and stir well.

Ingredients: Sugar, corn syrup solids, cocoa, coconut oil, salt, modified milk ingredients, tricalcium phosphate, carboxymethyl, cellulose gum, mono and diglycerides, artificial flavour, dipotassium phosphate, silicon dioxide, maltol, sodium silico aluminate, colour.

entry.title: Kingsmill - Cappuccino Mix - 6 x 907 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kingsmill
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 39.99

Kingsmill - Cappuccino - 6 x 907 g

Balancing coffee and milk ingredients, our Cappuccino offers a smooth finish from start to finish while still delivering those coffee notes.

This Cappuccino comes with all the flavor and frothiness of decadent cafe drinks without all of the time and effort. Each pack of mix delivers a consistent product each and every time. This mix is designed for use in a hot chocolate or cappuccino machine for bulk preparation, but is also ideal for making individual cups by hand mixing with hot water. The perfect addition to any establishment, this mix is sure to please patrons at your coffee shop, restaurant, concession stand, convenience store, or waiting room.

INGREDIENTS

Sugars (sugar, corn syrup solids), Coconut oil, Modified milk ingredients, Instant coffee, Salt, Tricalcium phosphate, Cellulose gum, Dipotassium phosphate, Mono-and diglycerides, Cocoa, Natural flavour, Sodium silico aluminate. Contains milk.

entry.title: Mother Parkers - Exclusive Blend Red Coffee - 64 x 2 Oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mother Parkers
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 94.99

Product Details

Mother Parkers Exclusive Coffee features a mouth-watering blend of the finest Arabica coffee beans for a smooth, gourmet taste you'll love. To create this exclusive blend, Mother Parkers starts with Colombian beans for a full-bodied flavour then adds Guatemalan beans for a slightly spicy note, Costa Rican beans for unparalleled smoothness and richness, and Brazilian beans for their light, nutty character. The result is a delicious coffee with a unique, satisfying personality. Packaged as 64 individually-sealed pouches per carton for long-lasting freshness, this ground coffee makes a great addition to any home or office kitchen.

  • Exclusive blend contains Colombian, Guatemalan, Costa Rican and Brazilian coffee beans for a unique, gourmet taste
  • Individual pouches are tightly sealed for maximum freshness
  • Ideal for home use or to share at the office

Mother Parkers - Exclusive Blend Red - 64 x 2 Oz

entry.title: Nestle Nescafe - Sweet & Creamy French Vanilla Sachets - 18 x 22 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 8.29

  • Pack of 6 boxes (18 sachets per box)
  • All in one instant French vanilla coffee
  • Predosed, no sugar, coffee creamer or coffee whitener required
  • Makes a consistently sweet and creamy cup of coffee
  • Perfect at home or on-the-go

With NESCAFÉ Sweet & Creamy French Vanilla Mix (18 x 22 g), you are never more than moments away from a consistently delicious cup of coffee. Just rip a pre-dosed sachet into a mug, stir and enjoy a sweet and creamy cup of self-made coffee. Stir, sip, love!
